website_summaries.verdict: Extremely large light box tracer, so you can work on many different kinds of projects successfully.
pros: Even with its large size, this light box is very thin at about 0.3", so it's easy to transport wherever it's needed
Ships with the electrical adapter you need to power the device
Delivers an even lighting surface, meaning you won't have dark spots to deal with, which is impressive in such a thin design
cons: Some build quality issues that cause occasional power failures

customer_reviews.title: I have been a professional photographer for 50 years. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been a professional photographer for 50 years. I am in the process of reviewing all my transparencies and negatives from that journey. I am literally plowing through thousands of slides and images captured on sheet film. This tool outperforms any lightbox I've used in the past. The fact that it is about a half an inch thick and yet produces even light corner to corner makes it portable and it's surface is large enough to handle the task at hand. Looking forward to using it as a light source after I finish sorting my transparencies.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Perry

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the Price, but not as bright as artograph light boxes. It might have been better to put the on/off switch on the side rather than on the top, where it's too easy to turn off while working.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Ramzyk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for the money! I applique and it's great for my needs. Bright enough for paper and fabric to show through to copy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: quilter

customer_reviews.title: An excellent alternative to the old light tables used to edit ...
customer_reviews.text: An excellent alternative to the old light tables used to edit (sort) photographic negatives and transparencies. It can also be used to provide even top lighting when photographing small products.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Sandoz

customer_reviews.title: Bright and perfect
customer_reviews.text: Going through a ton of slides from my photography father and this was a huge help. It arrived in perfect condition. It was a cinch to setup and used it right away!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Holcombe

customer_reviews.title: the LED illumination is easy on the eyes. I work for hours without "eye" fatigue.
customer_reviews.text: Presently I'm reviewing years of negatives and slides. I bought the largest size light box and is the best light source for this purpose that I have ever used. I liked mine so much that I bought a second one. They can be used side by side to review strips of uncut negatives. I'm considering using one for contact printing.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Curran

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: Nice and bright. Light enough to carry around easily. This makes drawing and tracing so much easier. One of my most favorite pruchases
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great LED Light Box for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Thin, very bright, and lightweight. Works well for tracing, even on heavy watercolor paper. The light is surprisingly even, given the large surface. I think it is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Cascadian

customer_reviews.title: Ultralight and supergood.
customer_reviews.text: Light, easy for travel projects. Ultra thin, dimmable and easy to operate. Easy to clean. Packing is perfect when going to places, so save it.
customer_reviews.author: Yola

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! Very good packing.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the sleek looks the excellent finish and good brightness. The display is very evenly lit and the surface is flawless.!! Even the power supply cord was of good length.Has rules on 2 axis . If I want to be picky --- I might want it brighter and with adjustable levels. Multicolor LED Back lighting? Hmmm.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay  S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing size, quality
customer_reviews.text: Just received it and instantly impressed once I unpacked and pluged it in. Can't wait to use it. Amazing size, quality, and brightness and diming capabilities are impressive. Didn't give it the 5th star because I don't know how long will the overall longevity of this product will be-but sure will attempt to give the 5th star in the near future should it continue to deliver this quality.
customer_reviews.author: Morning Star Academy (MSA)

customer_reviews.title: Slim and amazing
customer_reviews.text: This light table is fantastic! One of the students had purchased it before summer session and I was excited to purchase my own. Very easy to use and super bright for thicker paper tracing. I love my super heavy duty light table, but this is great for portablity.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Butkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Great product at the right price.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this LED light box. I've worked with other light boxes which have been lit by incandescent or florescent bulbs which were hot and annoying. The LEDs give off little heat and the light is even across the entire work surface.
customer_reviews.author: William92

customer_reviews.title: Thought I was rolling the dice
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure what to expect. Baller. I shoot quite a bit of film and this is perfect for cutting film. Not spotty at all
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: IBack in the stone age when I was a student, I once built a light table with florescent tubes. LED has brought us into a new world. A brilliant product (pun intended :)
customer_reviews.author: Inside man

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised - good quality and design.
customer_reviews.text: Though not a complicated. product, I am happy with the quality and performance. It looks and works like an expensive item.
customer_reviews.author: CV-OT-OM

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is fabulous. I use it for tracing quilt patterns. Much easier than taping them to the window like I used to do. Thin and easy to store. A great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This light box is incredible!! Why did I try to use that bulky little one for so many years?? Wow! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Alice ThompsonTop Contributor: Harmonicas

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for going through 20 years of slides. ...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for going through 20 years of slides. In case you don't know what a slide is, it's a color negative sandwiched between cardboard and shown through a projector!
customer_reviews.author: Dale Showalter

customer_reviews.title: Sets off the glass we sell. People can't help but notice.
customer_reviews.text: We are warm glass artists. We've added this to the front table in our booth. Nearly everything we put on the light sells!
customer_reviews.author: Dave G.

customer_reviews.title: 👀👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Works like a dream! Perfect to just leave on my drafting table
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK but not great.
customer_reviews.text: The light I'd not strong enough and the switch to turn it on\off and up and down is in an awkward spot. It's on the lower right side and can easily switch off. Inadvertently while working.
customer_reviews.author: Thetopiaryflorist

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the adjustability of the light and the large surface. Excellent for embroidery tracing.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: It came in a timely manner, everything works, and I love to use it for my artwork. It’s bigger than most of the other light pads I’ve looked at and I like that aspect of it. This is a great product that isn’t too expensive! I love it so much
customer_reviews.author: Elatialoamarts

customer_reviews.title: Truly Portable
customer_reviews.text: We are landscape designers, we bought this light box for a Home and Garden Show gig we were in. It worked perfectly. It's big enough but not too big.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Schuchman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My light box has been very useful. I like the look, weight, length of electric cord.
customer_reviews.author: dlg

customer_reviews.title: Just an awesome piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Just an awesome piece of equipment. It works and works flawlessly , pretty bright, compact and very cool. Used for some flower photography.
customer_reviews.author: H. Torosian

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This light board is incredible! Works perfectly and is a beautiful design. I wish I would have known about this years ago! I am a photographer - so it's perfect for reviewing my negatives!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use it with a student to help develop fine motor skills while enjoying tracing his favorite characters.
customer_reviews.author: gmelch1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and reasonable price. I would recommend this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great size and bright
customer_reviews.text: Used my light for Diamond Painting and was very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Aryanfard

customer_reviews.title: Would of gotten 5 stars if the power source apapter’s ...
customer_reviews.text: Would of gotten 5 stars if the power source apapter’s cable was not a piece of junk, so much wiggle room if you move the light box the LEDs will flutter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my light box I use it to light up ...
customer_reviews.text: Love my light box I use it to light up the glass for my stained glass projects it lets me see the colors better indoors
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Stewart

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Lights up. Kinda thin and nervous it might crack if any weight is put on it. Afraid to rest arms on it
customer_reviews.author: Patricia D.

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: Used the light box for scanning negatives. Did the job well.
customer_reviews.author: ESW

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift therefore the lihlght box has not been used at this time
customer_reviews.author: Larry Earhart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size the perfect brightness for an artist
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The size is great, love how thin it is and light weight. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Krog

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great, supper thin and very bright
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great, supper thin and very bright. Also found out you can adjust then brightness on it as welll which is a cool feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I liked that it arrived in perfect condition when it was ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it arrived in perfect condition when it was supposed too! There was nothing I didn't like.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Mohrmann

customer_reviews.title: Not for photography.
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this would be really really bright, like a light table for photography. This is fine for tracing, but it's not bright enough for photography. Also, if dimmed, it pulses oddly.
customer_reviews.author: Zaphod

customer_reviews.title: Super bright.
customer_reviews.text: Loving it, super bright. I've had it for over a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great slide viewer
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought this as a light source for taking digital photos in a box but it emits a flickering light so it was not suitable for that purpose. Great for viewing slides.
customer_reviews.author: Philip H. Fischbacher

product_meta.title: Monoprice Ultra-thin Light Box for Artists, Designers and Photographers - Large 24.5-inch - (112085)
product_meta.description: View film transparencies, trace graphics, or even give yourself light therapy using this Ultra-thin Light Box from Monoprice!A light box has many uses, from film and photography, to outdoor advertising, to graphic design, and even to medical therapy. This LED light box features a 24.5" work space, as measured diagonally. Overall, it measures 22.4" x 14.6" x 0.3" and is powered using the included 12VDC AC adapter.
feature_bullets: View film transparencies, trace graphics, or even give yourself light therapy using this Ultra-thin Light Box from Monoprice!
A light box has many uses, from film and photography, to outdoor advertising, to graphic design, and even to medical therapy.
This LED light box features a 24.5" work space, as measured diagonally. Overall, it measures 22.4" x 14.6" x 0.3" and is powered using the included 12VDC AC adapter.
